title: Buckwheat breakfast bowl
ingredients: ['20g buckwheat flakes', '2 teaspoons chia seeds', '1 tablespoon coconut, divided', '1 teaspoon milled flaxseed', '1/8 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/8 teaspoon vanilla powder or 1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract', '80ml milk', '2 tablespoons mixed berries', '1 teaspoon agave syrup']
